name: Tunche
summary: Tunche is a charming, hand-drawn beat'em up hack and slash game with roguelike elements, co-op, and a pinch of shaman witchcraft. Choose one of the five heroes, master their skill-sets and ultimate abilities defeat epic bosses, and unravel the secrets of the mysterious Amazonian jungle!
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: PS4
  • 游戏类型: Beat 'em up
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 4人
  • 发行日期: 2021年3月
  • 官方网站: http://tunchegame.com/
  • 开发: LEAP Game Studios
  • 发行: HypeTrain Digital
